components.name: ZenAvatarComponent

propertiesClass.name: alt
propertiesClass.description: Sets or retrieves a text alternative to the graphic.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Sets or retrieves a text alternative to the graphic.

propertiesClass.name: src
propertiesClass.description: Name of the source image. Image name will be processed by the image loader, and the final URL will be applied as the src property of the image.
propertiesClass.rawdescription:
Name of the source image. Image name will be processed by the image loader,
and the final URL will be applied as the src property of the image.

components.description:
A component to display an avatar image. If a valid image source URL is provided, it will render an image element. Otherwise, it will display projected content.

This component utilizes Angular's optimized image directives for enhanced performance.

Usage

To use the component, you can provide an image source or project content:

Example :
<!-- If an image source is provided, it will display the image -->
<zen-avatar [src]="'/path/to/image.jpg'" />

<!-- If no image source is provided, it will display the projected content -->
<zen-avatar> A </zen-avatar>

CSS Custom Properties

You can customize the avatar using CSS custom properties:

Example :
zen-avatar {
 --zen-avatar-size: 16px;
 --zen-avatar-bg-color: black;
 --zen-avatar-color: white;
 --zen-avatar-font-size: small;
}
Example :
<zen-avatar src="https://picsum.photos/32" />

See GitHub
components.rawdescription:
A component to display an avatar image.
If a valid image source URL is provided, it will render an image element.
Otherwise, it will display projected content.

This component utilizes Angular's optimized image directives for enhanced performance.

### Usage

To use the component, you can provide an image source or project content:

```html
<!-- If an image source is provided, it will display the image -->
<zen-avatar [src]="'/path/to/image.jpg'" />

<!-- If no image source is provided, it will display the projected content -->
<zen-avatar> A </zen-avatar>
```

### CSS Custom Properties

You can customize the avatar using CSS custom properties:

```css
zen-avatar {
 --zen-avatar-size: 16px;
 --zen-avatar-bg-color: black;
 --zen-avatar-color: white;
 --zen-avatar-font-size: small;
}
```

```html
<zen-avatar src="https://picsum.photos/32" />
```
See [GitHub](https://github.com/Kordrad/ng-zen)

components.name: ZenButtonComponent
components.description:
ZenButtonComponent is a reusable button component designed to provide a consistent and customizable button style across the application. It can be used with both <button> and <a> HTML elements by applying the zen-button attribute.

Example :
<button zen-btn> ... </button>

See GitHub
components.rawdescription:
ZenButtonComponent is a reusable button component designed to provide
a consistent and customizable button style across the application.
It can be used with both `<button>` and `<a>` HTML elements by applying
the `zen-button` attribute.

```html
<button zen-btn> ... </button>
```
See [GitHub](https://github.com/Kordrad/ng-zen)

components.name: ZenCheckboxComponent

inputsClass.name: disabled
inputsClass.rawdescription: Determines if the checkbox is disabled.

inputsClass.name: id
inputsClass.description: Sets the HTML id attribute for the checkbox element.
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the HTML id attribute for the checkbox element.

propertiesClass.name: disabled
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Determines if the checkbox is disabled.

propertiesClass.name: id
propertiesClass.description: Sets the HTML id attribute for the checkbox element.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Sets the HTML id attribute for the checkbox element.

propertiesClass.name: required
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Determines if the input is required.

components.description:
ZenCheckboxComponent is a reusable checkbox component designed to provide a consistent and customizable checkbox style across the application. It supports Angular forms integration and provides two-way data binding for boolean values.

Example :
<zen-checkbox checked="boolean" />

See GitHub
components.rawdescription:
ZenCheckboxComponent is a reusable checkbox component designed to provide
a consistent and customizable checkbox style across the application.
It supports Angular forms integration and provides two-way data binding
for boolean values.

```html
<zen-checkbox checked="boolean" />
```

See [GitHub](https://github.com/Kordrad/ng-zen)

components.description:
ZenInputComponent is a reusable text input component designed to provide a consistent and customizable input style across the application. It supports Angular forms integration and provides two-way data binding.

Example :
<zen-input value="string" />

See GitHub
components.rawdescription:
ZenInputComponent is a reusable text input component designed to provide
a consistent and customizable input style across the application.
It supports Angular forms integration and provides two-way data binding.

```html
<zen-input value="string" />
```

See [GitHub](https://github.com/Kordrad/ng-zen)
